actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the utilization of the latest available census data in certain laws related to Energy and Natural Resources.
short_title: Energy Extension Fair Share Act of 1992

summary.text: Energy Extension Fair Share Act of 1992 - Amends the National Energy Extension Service Act to provide for the use of population figures provided by the latest available estimates prepared by the Department of Commerce (currently, provided by the most recent decennial census) for the calculation of the apportionment of State energy extension service funds.

titles.title: Energy Extension Fair Share Act of 1992
A bill to provide for the utilization of the latest available census data in certain laws related to Energy and Natural Resources.
